column1: File:Narfil Pal√πrfalas - Gondolin Plan.jpg showing the Place of the Well  The Place of the Well
column2: also known as the Square of the Folkwell
column3: was a large square in Gondolin just north of the Square of the King.  The square had many oak and poplar trees
column4: and also a great well of vast depth with very pure water.  However
column5: in the fall of Gondolin the well became polluted with the carcases of Orcs.
